item.title: 中国誓言明年发行更多债务并降低利率
item.description: 中国周四承诺增加预算赤字、发行更多债务并放松货币政策，以保持经济稳定增长，同时为与美国之间更紧张的贸易关系做准备。【原文：China pledged on Thursday to increase the budget deficit, issue more debt and loosen monetary policy to maintain a stable economic growth rate as it gears up for more trade tensions with the United States.】

item.title: Adobe 因年度收入预测引发对人工智能回报延迟的担忧而下跌
item.description: Adobe 公司的股票在周四的盘前交易中下跌了近 10%，原因是这家 Photoshop 制造商对全年营收的预期不乐观，导致市场担心对其软件应用程序进行人工智能投资的回报时间可能比预期的要长。【原文：Shares of Adobe fell nearly 10% in premarket trading on Thursday after the Photoshop maker's downbeat full-year revenue forecast led to concerns that returns from AI investments into its software applications might take longer than expected.】

item.title: 百度和吉利的电动车合资企业在表示需要新资金后面临骚动
item.description: 周四网上发布的视频显示，在电动汽车制造商表示将精简运营以应对激烈的市场竞争一天后，中国吉悦汽车公司的首席执行官被一群人包围，要求知道他们将如何获得报酬。【原文：The CEO of China's Ji Yue Auto was surrounded by people demanding to know how they would be paid, videos posted online on Thursday showed, a day after the EV maker said it would streamline operations to cope with fierce market competition.】

item.title: 英伟达否认将削减对华供应的传言
item.description: 据 Nvidia 在中国社交媒体上发布的一篇文章称，该公司最近在社交媒体上发布的声称该公司将削减对华供应的帖子是虚假的。【原文：Nvidia said recent social media posts alleging the company would cut supplies to China were false, according to a company post on Chinese social media.】

item.title: 美国参议员和环保组织呼吁追究埃克森公司批评者遭黑客攻击的责任
item.description: 有报道称，埃克森美孚公司的一名说客因涉嫌参与针对该石油公司著名批评者的黑客泄密行动而受到调查，两名民主党参议员和众多环保组织呼吁进行调查并追究责任。【原文：Two Democratic senators and a host of environmental groups have called for investigations and accountability following a report that a lobbyist for Exxon Mobil had been investigated for its alleged role in a sweeping hack-and-leak operation that targeted prominent critics of the oil company.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔石油业因燃料盗窃和暴力事件损失 2.15 亿美元
item.description: 厄瓜多尔有组织犯罪团伙越来越多地从国营石油公司 Petroecuador 窃取燃料，用于支持贩毒活动，导致该国第一大产业损失了数亿美元的收入。【原文：Organized crime groups in Ecuador are increasingly stealing fuel from state-run oil company Petroecuador to support drug trafficking operations, resulting in hundreds of millions in lost income for the country's top industry, the company and officials said.】

item.title: 特朗普加密企业与与中东武装分子有关联的平台合作
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普及其新任中东特使、亿万富翁史蒂夫-维特科夫（Steve Witkoff）最近推出的一家加密企业与一个加密平台建立了合作关系，而当局和金融专家称，该平台已被犯罪分子和伊朗支持的激进组织哈马斯和真主党所利用。【原文：A crypto venture recently unveiled by U.S. President-elect Donald Trump and his new Middle East envoy, billionaire Steve Witkoff, has partnered with a crypto platform that authorities and financial experts say has been used by criminals and Iran-backed militant groups Hamas and Hezbollah.】

item.title: 洞察：波音公司为再次制造最畅销飞机所做的努力
item.description: 自一个多月前波音公司在美国多家飞机制造厂的瘫痪性罢工结束以来，其最畅销的 737 MAX 喷气式飞机的增产进度一直刻意放缓。【原文：Since a crippling strike at many of Boeing's U.S. plane factories ended more than a month ago, progress ramping up production of its best-selling 737 MAX jet has been deliberately slow.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克指数强劲收盘后期指下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周四暂停交易，此前标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数以积极的态势收盘，投资者在等待当天更多的经济数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures took a pause on Thursday after the S&P 500 and Nasdaq ended the previous session on a positive note, while investors awaited some more economic data on the day.】

item.title: 早间竞价：纳斯达克指数突破 2 万点，欧洲因瑞士意外事件而有所缓和
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国监管机构为银行透支费设定上限遭业界反对
item.description: 美国消费者金融监督机构周四通过了新的规定，对银行的透支额度设置了上限，并称该规定每年将为储户节省 50 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. watchdog agency for consumer finance on Thursday adopted new regulations capping the amount banks can charge for overdrafts, saying the rule would save depositors $5 billion annually.】

item.title: 三星指控印度反垄断机构非法拘禁员工和扣押数据
item.description: 一份法律文件显示，三星指控印度竞争监督机构在对亚马逊和沃尔玛旗下 Flipkart 进行反垄断调查时，非法拘禁其员工并扣押数据。【原文：Samsung has accused India's competition watchdog of unlawfully detaining its employees and seizing data in a raid carried out in connection with an antitrust investigation on Amazon and Walmart's Flipkart, a legal filing shows.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行降息 50 个基点
item.description: 瑞士国家银行周四将利率下调了 50 个基点，这是近 10 年来最大的一次降息，因为它试图领先于其他央行的降息预期，并抑制瑞郎的升值。【原文：The Swiss National Bank cut its interest rate by 50 basis points on Thursday, its biggest reduction in almost 10 years as it sought to stay ahead of expected cuts by other central banks and cap the rise of the Swiss franc.】

item.title: Blackstone 将以 26 亿美元的交易从西武手中收购东京办公楼
item.description: Blackstone 周四表示，它将以 26 亿美元的价格收购东京市中心的一栋高端写字楼，并称这是外国投资者在日本进行的最大一笔房地产投资。【原文：Blackstone said on Thursday that it will acquire a high-end office building in central Tokyo for $2.6 billion, a deal it says is the biggest real estate investment by a foreign investor in Japan.】

item.title: 落后于增长目标的中国新奥致力于加强成本控制
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）制造商尼奥公司首席执行官周四表示，该公司将努力提高效率和成本控制，以刺激落后两年的销售增长。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) maker Nio will seek to improve efficiency and cost control as it seeks to spur sales growth that is two years behind schedule, its CEO said on Thursday.】

item.title: 律师称，必和必拓和力拓在接到性骚扰投诉后迫使女性签署保密协议
item.description: 据一位领导澳大利亚对这两家矿商提起集体诉讼的律师称，必和必拓和力拓利用保密协议阻止女员工谈论工作中的性骚扰问题。【原文：BHP and Rio Tinto have used confidentiality agreements to prevent female employees from speaking about sexual harassment at work, according to a lawyer leading Australian class action lawsuits against the miners.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，俄罗斯石油公司与信实集团达成印度-俄罗斯有史以来最大的石油供应协议
item.description: 俄罗斯国家石油公司（Rosneft）已同意向印度私营炼油企业信实（Reliance）每天供应近 50 万桶原油，这是两国之间有史以来最大的一笔能源交易。【原文：Russia's state oil firm Rosneft has agreed to supply nearly 500,000 barrels per day (bpd) of crude to Indian private refiner Reliance in the biggest ever energy deal between the two countries, three sources familiar with the deal said.】

item.title: 商务部：中方对与特朗普经贸团队会谈持开放态度
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国愿意与特朗普政府的经贸团队进行接触和沟通。【原文：China is open to engaging and communicating with the economic and trade team of the Trump administration, the commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 工会称 Stellantis 将延长米拉菲奥里工厂的停工期至 1 月 20 日
item.description: 斯特兰蒂斯公司意大利米拉菲奥里工厂工会主席 FIOM-Cgil 周四表示，该工厂将把汽车停产时间再延长两周，直至 1 月 20 日。【原文：Stellantis will extend the stoppage of car production at its Italian Mirafiori plant by a further two weeks, until Jan. 20, the head of the FIOM-Cgil trade union at the site said on Thursday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行第一副首席执行官称，尽管受到西方制裁，俄罗斯仍将提升全球人工智能影响力
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的贷款机构储蓄银行（Sberbank）第一副首席执行官亚历山大-维迪亚克欣（Alexander Vedyakhin）告诉路透社记者，尽管受到西方制裁，但由于对生成性人工智能的关注和支持性监管，到2030年，俄罗斯仍有可能大幅提高其在全球人工智能评级中的地位。【原文：Russia has the potential to significantly improve its position in global AI ratings by 2030 despite Western sanctions due to a focus on generative AI and supportive regulation, Alexander Vedyakhin, first deputy CEO of Russia's largest lender Sberbank, told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国关税担忧加剧，亚洲外汇市场看跌押注维持不变
item.description: 对韩元和印度卢比的看跌押注飙升至两年来的新高，因为投资者越来越担心美国可能加征关税会削弱新兴市场资产的吸引力，因此紧紧抓住其他货币的空头头寸不放。【原文：Bearish bets on the South Korean won and the Indian rupee soared to a two-year high as investors clung to their short positions in other currencies on growing concerns that potential U.S. tariffs would undermine the appeal of emerging market assets.】

item.title: 经济学家称，英国基本避免了与美国的关税纠纷
item.description: 据路透社调查，绝大多数经济学家认为，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普明年将对英国进口商品征收低于10%的关税，或者根本不征收关税，这将对英国经济产生微不足道的影响。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump will impose a tariff of less than 10% on UK imports next year or none at all, which will have an insignificant effect on the UK economy, according to a strong majority of economists polled by Reuters.】

item.title: 欧洲 欧洲央行、瑞士央行将降息，但幅度有多大？
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称日本央行下周倾向于保持利率稳定
item.description: 熟悉日本央行想法的五位消息人士称，日本央行倾向于在下周维持利率稳定，因为决策者更愿意花更多时间仔细研究海外风险和明年工资前景的线索。【原文：The Bank of Japan is leaning toward keeping interest rates steady next week as policymakers prefer to spend more time scrutinising overseas risks and clues on next year's wage outlook, said five sources familiar with its thinking.】

item.title: 澳大利亚下令对 Kraken 加密交易所运营商罚款 510 万美元
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管部门周四表示，加密货币交易所 Kraken 的本地运营商已被勒令支付 800 万澳元（约合 510 万美元）的罚款，原因是该公司非法向该国 1100 多名客户发放信用贷款。【原文：Australia's corporate watchdog said on Thursday that the crypto exchange Kraken's local operator has been ordered to pay an A$8 million ($5.1 million) fine for unlawfully issuing a credit facility to more than 1,100 customers in the country.】

item.title: 独家报道申银万国 IPO：消息人士称，英国监管机构的决定因非政府组织的质疑而放缓
item.description: 据两位接近此事的消息人士透露，英国金融监管机构批准快速时尚零售商Shein上市的时间比往常要长，因为在中国维吾尔族权益组织对其上市提出质疑后，监管机构正在检查其供应链监督情况并评估法律风险。【原文：Britain's financial regulator is taking longer than usual to approve fast-fashion retailer Shein's IPO because it is checking its supply chain oversight and assessing legal risks after an advocacy group for China's Uyghur population challenged the listing, according to two sources close to the matter.】

item.title: 11 月泰国消费者信心指数上升
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，受政府经济措施和旅游业的推动，11月份泰国消费者信心连续第二个月上升。【原文：Thai consumer confidence rose for a second consecutive month in November, bolstered by government economic measures and tourism, a survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英伟达加大在华招聘力度，专注于人工智能驱动的汽车领域
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三报道，英伟达（Nvidia）今年在中国增加了数百名员工，以增强其研究能力并专注于新的自动驾驶技术。【原文：Nvidia has added hundreds of staff in China this year to enhance its research capabilities and focus on new autonomous driving technologies, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大韩航空完成韩亚航空收购，成为亚洲最大的航空公司之一
item.description: 大韩航空（Korean Air）周四表示，该公司已经完成了对负债累累的韩国竞争对手韩亚航空（Asiana Airlines）的收购，这是朝着组建亚洲最大航空公司之一迈出的重要一步。【原文：Korean Air has completed its protracted purchase of indebted South Korean rival Asiana Airlines , the airline said on Thursday, a major step towards forming one of Asia's biggest carriers.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因美联储减息押注而反弹；澳元因就业数据而跳涨
item.description: 周四亚洲股市上涨，追随隔夜华尔街以科技股为主导的涨势，此前美国消费者通胀数据符合预期，巩固了对美联储下周降息的押注。【原文：Asian stocks gained on Thursday, tracking Wall Street's tech-led rally overnight after an as-expected reading of U.S. consumer inflation cemented bets for a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut next week.】
